title: Moon Landing Reboot, Pete Buttigieg's 2020 Bid & More Cruelty from Trump | Jennifer L. Eberhardt
itunes:title: Moon Landing Reboot, Pete Buttigieg's 2020 Bid & More Cruelty from Trump | Jennifer L. Eberhardt
description:
Trevor profiles 2020 presidential hopeful Pete Buttigieg, Michael Kosta addresses harsh proposals from the Trump administration, and Dr. Jennifer L. Eberhardt talks "Biased."
